attributes.action: take active measures against Iran following its illegal hostage taking of Royal Navy personnel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Commencing with but not limited to interception and internment of all Iran flagged vessels at sea. Similarily internment of all Iranian aircraft entering our airspace. Pressure on our NATO Allies to do the same.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
